mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.*,ROWNUM R FROM (SELECT M.*,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members) FROM members M where id not in('admin') ORDER BY join_date DESC)T) WHERE R BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) from members where gender = #{gender}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.*,ROWNUM R FROM (SELECT M.*,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members) FROM members M where to_char(join_date, 'yyyymmdd' ) between to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') ORDER BY join_date DESC)T) WHERE R BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) from members where to_char(join_date,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
select count(*) from members where to_char(join_date,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyymmdd')
select count(*) from members where to_char(join_date,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate-2, 'yyyymmdd')
select B.*,M.name from members M join bandmember BM on BM.id=M.id join band B on B.b_name = BM.b_name
select B.b_no,BM.* from band B join bandmusic BM on B.b_no = BM.b_no where B.b_name=#{B.b_name}
